item.title: Teaching experience
item.description:
Teaching assistant Introduction to statistics , for second year management bachelor students, (34h), 2019
Probability distributions (Binomial, Poisson, Gaussian) Confidence interval and tests (Mean, Variance and Proportion) Statistical inference, for second year economy bachelor students, (30h), 2018 Confidence interval and tests Definition of an estimator Maximum likelihood estimator and likelihood tests
